garden-app-id.name: garden-app-id
garden-app-id.description: If you do not yet have an app ID, please follow these [steps](/api-reference/setup).

total_earnings.description: Total earnings in asset units for the affiliate.

total_earnings_usd.description: Total earnings in USD for the mentioned asset for the affiliate.

affiliate.description: The address that will receive the earnings.

token_address.description: Contract address for the affiliate fee asset.

claim_amount.description: Amount available for claiming in asset units. Only included if the affiliate has not yet claimed their earnings.

claim_amount_usd.description: Amount available for claiming in USD. Only included if the affiliate has not yet claimed their earnings.

claim_signature.description: Signature for claiming earnings. Only included if the affiliate has not yet claimed their earnings.

claim_contract.description: Contract address for claiming earnings. Only included if the affiliate has not yet claimed their earnings.

delegate.description: **(Optional)** Executes the swap on behalf of the user. Use this when calling Garden from your own smart contract; provide your contract’s address here.

swap_id.description: A unique identifier for the swap.

delegate.description: Address that performed the swap for the user, if applicable.

timelock.description: Timelock for the swap (in block numbers).

asset_price.description: Price of the asset during swap.

secret.description: The secret used to lock the funds on-chain.

instant_refund_tx.description: On-chain transaction hash of instant refund.

initiate_block_number.description: Block number of the initiate transaction.

redeem_block_number.description: Block number of the redeem transaction.

refund_block_number.description: Block number of the refund transaction.

current_confirmations.description: Number of confirmations received so far.

order_id.description: A unique identifier for the order.

affiliate_fees.description: Integrator fees associated with the order.

slippage.description:
**(Optional)** In BIPS (base index points) 100 bips = 1%
When not specified, the slippage configured in app settings is used, or zero if no default is configured.

nonce.description: **(Optional)** Custom nonce for the order. If not provided, one will be generated.

solver_id.description: **(Optional)** Specific solver ID to use for this order.

affiliate_fees.description: **(Optional)** Add an [affiliate fee](https://garden-e60e7dd0-chore-updatedescriptions.mintlify.app/developers/affiliate-fees) to each swap, defined in bips (100 bips = 1%).

signature.description: An ECDSA signature generated by the initiator over an EIP-712 typed data message containing parameters such as the redeemer address and secret hash obtained from the [create order endpoint](./create-order). Submitting this signature enables the relayer to initiate the swap on behalf of the initiator, making the process gasless for the user.

signatures.description: A Schnorr signature generated by the initiator over the instant refund hash obtained from the [instant refund hash endpoint](./get-instant-refund-hash). This signature represents the initiator’s partial spend authorization for the Taproot script controlling the initiator's UTXO. Submitting this signature allows the solver to later provide its own Schnorr signature to fully satisfy the Taproot instant refund leaf and broadcast the refund transaction instantly, without requiring further initiator interaction.

order_id.description: A unique identifier for the order.
A unique identifier for the order.

approval_transaction.description: Can be `null`, if user has already given approval.

order_id.description: A unique identifier for the order.

approval_transaction.description: Can be `null`, if user has already given approval.

order_id.description: A unique identifier for the order.
A unique identifier for the order.

amount.description: Raw asset amount in the smallest unit (e.g., satoshis for BTC, wei for ETH).

display.description: Amount after applying decimal places (e.g., 0.01 BTC).

value.description: Fiat value (in USD) equivalent of the displayed amount.

solver_id.description: A unique identifier for the solver who provided the quote.

fee.description: in BIPS (base index points) where 100 bips = 1%

default.description: Default policy for routes not covered by specific rules.

isolation_groups.description: Assets in an isolation group can ONLY trade with other assets in the same group.

blacklist_pairs.description: Explicitly forbidden trading pairs using pattern matching.

whitelist_overrides.description: Explicit overrides that bypass other restrictions.

get.summary: Get instant refund hash for the given swap.

get.description: Get quote for the given asset pair.

parameters.name: affiliate_fee
parameters.description: **(Optional)** Add an [affiliate fee](https://garden-e60e7dd0-chore-updatedescriptions.mintlify.app/developers/affiliate-fees) to each swap, defined in bips (100 bips = 1%).

parameters.name: slippage
parameters.description: **(Optional)** Add slippage up to 5% for each quote/swap, defined in bips (100 bips = 1%.

parameters.description: **(Optional)** Asset filter.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: **(Optional)** Filter orders by address.

parameters.name: tx_hash
parameters.description: **(Optional)** Filter orders by transaction hash.

parameters.name: from_chain
parameters.description: **(Optional)** Filter orders by source chain.

parameters.name: to_chain
parameters.description: **(Optional)** Filter orders by destination chain.

parameters.name: from_owner
parameters.description: **(Optional)** Filter orders by source owner. Comma-separated for multiple values.

parameters.name: to_owner
parameters.description: **(Optional)** Filter orders by destination owner. Comma-separated for multiple values.

parameters.name: solver_id
parameters.description: **(Optional)** Filter orders by solver ID. Comma-separated for multiple values.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: **(Optional)** Page number.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: **(Optional)** Number of items per page.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: **(Optional)** Filter orders by status. Comma-separated string with allowed values: not-initiated, in-progress, completed, expired, refunded.
